revision.text:
[[Image:Sapphire.png|right|thumb|230px|In space, nobody can hear you say "Wow... cool scenery"]]
{{Wad | name = Sapphire - Orbital Research | author = Tormentor667 | port = GZDoom | iwad = Doom2 | type = s | status = Released | link = [http://www.realm667.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=330&Itemid=1 Download from Realm667] }} == Description ==
Set in a space station floating above a planet colonised by the UAC, Sapphire sends you around a shiny, high tech environment in order to fight back the forces of evil, room by room. The map rounds off with a boss battle with a creature of Eriance's creation (originally seen in [[Demon Eclipse]]), and along the way you can expect a few large battles to keep your adrenaline pumping. This single large map will certainly give your eyes some exercise.
== External Links ==
